channel.title: DragonKK Trade System and Drops
channel.description:
Hey, can someone please point me in the direction of a trade system for a 614 dragonkk source, such as legacy? For some reason the source I downloaded doesn't have working trading.
Also, how do i make items disappear when dropped?
Thanks in advanced for the help!
